package.name: Horde_Http
package.description: A library for making HTTP requests.

release.notes: * First alpha release for Horde 4. * Refactor to support multiple request transports, including Curl and the PECL http extension.
* First beta release for Horde 4.
* First release candidate for Horde 4.
* Second release candidate for Horde 4.
* First stable release for Horde 4.
* [cjh] Consistently implement configurable following of redirects (Bug #9898).
* [jan] Fix regression with HTTP authentication.
* [gwr] Allow setting request parameters on the existing client instance.
* [gwr] Added SOCKS proxy support where available.
* [gwr] Support multiple mock responses with the mock request. * [gwr] Fixed setting response headers for the mock response.

* [cjh] Fix infinite loop on unknown parameters being set. * [cjh] Return real data for HTTP 4xx and 5xx responses when using fopen(). * [cjh] Fix setting PUT data in the Peclhttp Horde_Http_Request class.
* First alpha release for Horde 5.
* First beta release for Horde 5.
* [jan] Add verifyPeer request option to disable verification of certification peers during SSL request. * [jan] Fix error handling in Fopen driver if a custom error handler is installed.
* First stable release for Horde 5.
* [mms] Use new Horde_Test layout.
* [jan] Allow self-signed certificates when using the fopen driver.
* [jan] Add configuration option to set User-Agent.
* [jan] Provide more useful messages when throwing exceptions.
* [mms] Fopen driver needs to handle URIs without a protocol scheme - default to http (Bug #12991).
* [jan] Add support for PECL http 2.0 extension (Michael Cramer <michael@bigmichi1.de>).
* [jan] Fix HTTP authentication with PECL HTTP drivers. * [jan] Always cast reponse body to string with pecl_http 2.0 (Michael Cramer <michael@bigmichi1.de>).
* [mms] Horde_Http_Base_Response#getHeader() is now case-insensitive for the header input (Bug #13736).
* [jan] Add unit tests for PECL HTTP 1.x/2.x drivers.
* [jan] Make Horde_Http_Base_Response::headers array keys lowercase again (Bug #13843). * [jan] Fix return code from multi-request actions in Peclhttp2 driver.
* [jan] Allow to pass Horde_Url objects as URI (Bug #13897).
* [jan] Fix disabling SSL certificate hostname check (Thomas Jarosch <thomas.jarosch@intra2net.com>, Bug #12929). * [jan] Mark PHP 7 as supported.
* [jan] Support HTTP PECL extension version 3.x.
